DOC.criteria: Subject male 18 45 year age screen Subject stable weight ( Â± 2 kg ) 6 week prior screen Subject history ileal bypass , gastric bypass , significant condition associate malabsorption Subject active recent ( < 2 week ) gastrointestinal condition ( gastroenteritis , diarrhea , chronic constipation , irritable bowl syndrome , etc . ) affect bowel movement Subject know allergy bean , pea , egg eggderived product and/or soy soyderived product Subject history plant sterol storage disease ( sitosterolemia , cerebrotendinotic xanthomatosis ) history intolerance plant sterol and/or plant sterol contain product Subject history hepatic gall bladder disease ( include gallstone , cholecystectomy , etc . ) Subject currently take psyllium , fiberbased laxative , phytosterol margarine , and/or counter ( OTC ) therapies know affect serum lipid Subject take lipidlowering agent within 6 week prior screen Subject previously administer intravenous infusion [ 13C3,4 ] cholesterol
